DOC.brief_summary: This study help researcher learn best dose radiation use treat large early stage non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) treatment call stereotactic ablative radiotherapy ( SABR ) . Current treatment SABR early stage NSCLC show positive response . But , large early stage NSCLC may better give different SABR dos use routine early stage NSCLC treatment . It understand dose best treat large early stage NSCLC . Therefore , study help researcher learn give high dose use SABR period 5-10 treatment day increase chance cure large early stage NSCLC .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Image Guided Stereotactic Ablative Radiotherapy Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment Plan : 7.5 Gy x 10 daily fraction deliver VMAT regular IMRT . - Optional schedule 12 Gy x 5 daily fraction may also use ONLY situation dose constraint organ risk EASILY meet optimal PTV coverage achieve ; 7.5 Gy x 10 daily fraction schedule prefer . - All dos prescribe tumor periphery . For protocol , patient follow 2 year post radiation therapy .
